attributes.action: Set up and fund more youth clubs for young people to have safe spaces to be.
attributes.additional_details: This will actively contribute to the development of young people and make a valuable contribution to reducing youth crime. This has been noted in many papers, by the police and people working with young people in different capacities.
attributes.background: To set aside and direct funding to reinstate and increase the number of youth clubs and youth workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638630
